page.title: 10BUILDINGS IN THE AREA
page.content: This block is particularly interesting because it is made up of 3 contrasting areas. Firstly there is{MARPLE,}a town of great variety of housing and shops dating mainly from Victorian times with several recent housing developments. Secondly there is the more village type atmosphere of{MARPLE BRIDGE}with 200 year old stone built property at its centre and one main shopping street. This too, is now surrounded by much modern housing. Thirdly moving out into the green belt area of{MELLOR}the balance between the old stone property and the newer houses is much more even. There are no estate type developments and very few shops, but there is a large farming community. The oldest building in the whole district is{MELLOR CHURCH. {
